original: 《 君主命令 》指派武將進行任務時，需要消耗 1道君主命令。如果沒有君主命令數量，則無法再派發新的任務，需要等到原本派發的任務完成、或取消任務，空出君主命令數。
text: "Monarch's Order" When assigning military commanders to perform tasks, one monarch's order needs to be consumed. If there is no number of monarch orders, no new tasks can be dispatched. You need to wait until the originally dispatched tasks are completed or cancel the tasks to free up the number of monarch orders.
